scripts.test:post-upgrade: node -e "const env=process.env.TARGET_ENV; const allowed=new Set(['localdocker','dev','staging','prod']); if(!allowed.has(env)){console.error('TARGET_ENV must be one of localdocker, dev, staging, prod'); process.exit(1)}" && POST_UPGRADE_SMOKE=1 hardhat test test/smoke/post-upgrade.smoke.test.js --network $TARGET_ENV
scripts.hardhat:deploy: node -e "const env=process.env.TARGET_ENV; const allowed=new Set(['localdocker','dev','staging','prod']); if(!allowed.has(env)){console.error('TARGET_ENV must be one of localdocker, dev, staging, prod'); process.exit(1)}" && hardhat run hardhat/deploy.js --network $TARGET_ENV
